member.summary: Gets or sets the output type.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether JSLint should run on build.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the build should be cancelled for JSLint errors.

member.summary: Gets the list of paths to ignore.

member.summary: Gets or sets the total error limit.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintNetSettings.FileLimit

member.name: T:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions
member.summary: Provides a simple way to create and manage the options used by JSLint.

member.name: M:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.PredefinedGlobals
member.summary: Gets the predefined globals.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateAssignmentExpressions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether assignment expressions should be allowed.
member.value: true if assignment expressions should be allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateBitwiseOperators
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether bitwise operators should be allowed.
member.value: true if bitwise operators should be allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.AssumeBrowser
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the standard browser globals should be predefined.
member.value: true if the standard browser globals should be predefined; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateGoogleClosure
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Google Closure idioms should be tolerated.
member.value: true if Google Closure idioms should be tolerated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateContinue
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the continuation statement should be tolerated.
member.value: true if the continuation statement should be tolerated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.AssumeCouchDB
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Couch DB globals should be predefined.
member.value: true if Couch DB globals should be predefined; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateDebuggerStatements
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether debugger statements should be allowed.
member.value: true if debugger statements should be allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.AssumeConsole
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether if browser globals that are useful in development should be predefined.
member.value: true if if browser globals that are useful in development should be predefined; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateDoubleEquals
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether == should be allowed.
member.value: true if == should be allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateEval
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether eval should be allowed.
member.value: true if eval should be allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateUnfilteredForIn
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether for in statements need not filter.
member.value: true if for in statements need not filter; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.IndentationFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the indentation factor.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.MaximumErrors
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of errors to allow.
member.value: The maximum number of errors to allow.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.MaximumLineLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum length of a source line.
member.value: The maximum length of a source line.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateUncapitalizedConstructors
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether constructor names capitalization is ignored.
member.value: true if constructor names capitalization is ignored; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.AssumeNode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Node.js globals should be predefined.
member.value: true if Node.js globals should be predefined; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateDanglingUnderscores
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether names may have dangling _.
member.value: true if names may have dangling _; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.StopOnFirstError
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the scan should stop on first error.
member.value: true if the scan should stop on first error; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateIncrementDecrement
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether increment/decrement should be allowed.
member.value: true if increment/decrement should be allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.PropertiesDeclared
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all property names must be declared with /*properties*/.
member.value: true if all property names must be declared with /*properties*/; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateInsecureRegExp
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the . should be allowed in regexp literals.
member.value: true if the . should be allowed in regexp literals; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.AssumeRhino
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Rhino environment globals should be predefined.
member.value: true if the Rhino environment globals should be predefined; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateUnusedParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether unused parameters should be tolerated.
member.value: true if unused parameters should be tolerated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateMissingUseStrict
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ES5 'use strict'; pragma is not required.
member.value: true if the ES5 'use strict'; pragma is not required; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateStupidPractices
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether blocking ('...Sync') methods can be used.
member.value: true if blocking ('...Sync') methods can be used; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateInefficientSubscripting
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all forms of subscript notation are tolerated.
member.value: true if all forms of subscript notation are tolerated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateToDoComments
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether TODO comments are tolerated.
member.value: true if TODO comments are tolerated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateManyVarStatements
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple var statements per function should be allowed.
member.value: true if multiple var statements per function should be allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateMessyWhitespace
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether sloppy whitespace is tolerated.
member.value: true if sloppy whitespace is tolerated; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Total JSLint error limit reached: {0}.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unhandled JSLint.NET exception limit reached: {0}.

P:JSLintNet.Properties.Resources.jslintEdition
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to JSLINT.edition;.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to JSLint edition from file system ({0}) cannot be lower than built-in edition ({1})..

member.name: P:JSLintNet.Properties.Resources.jslintRunFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to JSLINT({0}, JSON.parse({1}));.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.Properties.Resources.ProcessingExceptionFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An unexpected exception occurred processing file "{0}": {1}.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.Properties.Resources.ReportDocumentFormat
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to {1} {2}

{1} {2}

Source Directory:
{3}
Settings File:
{4}
Processed Files:
{5}
Files with Errors:
{6}
Total Errors:
{7}
{8} .

member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.summary: Gets or sets the source directory.

member.summary: Gets or sets the settings file.

member.summary: Gets the processed file count.
